name: dystopian
content:

relating to a very bad or unfair society in which there is a lot of suffering, especially an imaginary society in the future, or to the description of such a society: She mentioned Margaret Atwood's dystopian novel "The Handmaid's Tale," in which fertile young women are enslaved as reproductive servants. dystopian movies See
